ItemDesc: A section of a mech's bionic spinal column. Can be used for the Ascension of Lightning characters.
ItemBGDesc: The most important central component of the mech that was built in imitation of the borisin. Though the body that nurtured it no longer has even a sliver of life left, this component still maintains the "Slaughter Algorithm" inherited from primordial days and buried deep within its genes.\n\n"While you see a monster that can never be killed, I see infinite parts to salvage. That's the difference in perspective."
